curated_text: Symbol: QCOM. Year: 2025. Period: Q1. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: IoT, QTL, QCT, Qualcomm Technology Licensing, QSI, QGOV, Qualcomm Government Technologies, Data Center, QUALCOMM Incorporated, Qualcomm Technologies, Inc., QTI, Interest Expense and Investment, Change Interest, Income Tax Expense, OBBB, FDDEI, the Non-Arriver, Consolidated Financial Statements, Segment Information, EBT, Snapdragon, Mobile Data Modems, QTL Segment, Transsion, Huawei, QTL EBT, QSI Segment, Apple, Contingencies, Liquidity and Capital Resources, Capital Return Program, Capital Stock, Additional Capital Requirements, Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition, CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES Evaluation, Internal Control, RISKS RELATED TO HUMAN CAPITAL MANAGEMENT •, Standards Development Organizations, RISKS RELATED TO INDUSTRY DYNAMICS, CDMA.
